                              <div class="line">That stands on tricks when I am undisposed:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is the thousand marks thou hadst of me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I have some marks of yours upon my pate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Some of my mistress' marks upon my shoulders,</div>
                              <div class="line">But not a thousand marks between you both.</div>
                              <div class="line">If I should pay your worship those again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Perchance you will not bear them patiently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy mistress' marks? what mistress, slave, hast thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Your worship's wife, my mistress at the Phoenix;</div>
                              <div class="line">She that doth fast till you come home to dinner,</div>
                              <div class="line">And prays that you will hie you home to dinner.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What, wilt thou flout me thus unto my face,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being forbid? There, take you that, sir knave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What mean you, sir? for God's sake, hold your hands!</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, and you will not, sir, I'll take my heels.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my life, by some device or other</div>
                              <div class="line">The villain is o'er-raught of all my money.</div>
                              <div class="line">They say this town is full of cozenage,</div>
                              <div class="line">As, nimble jugglers that deceive the eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">Dark-working sorcerers that change the mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">Soul-killing witches that deform the body,</div>
                              <div class="line">Disguised cheaters, prating mountebanks,</div>
                              <div class="line">And many such-like liberties of sin:</div>
                              <div class="line">If it prove so, I will be gone the sooner.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll to the Centaur, to go seek this slave:</div>
                              <div class="line">I greatly fear my money is not safe.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  The house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  A public place.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  The house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ADRIANA and LUCIANA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither my husband nor the slave return'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">That in such haste I sent to seek his master!</div>
                              <div class="line">Sure, Luciana, it is two o'clock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Perhaps some merchant hath invited him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And from the mart he's somewhere gone to dinner.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good sister, let us dine and never fret:</div>
                              <div class="line">A man is master of his liberty:</div>
                              <div class="line">Time is their master, and, when they see time,</div>
                              <div class="line">They'll go or come: if so, be patient, sister.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why should their liberty than ours be more?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Because their business still lies out o' door.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, when I serve him so, he takes it ill.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, know he is the bridle of your will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">There's none but asses will be bridled so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, headstrong liberty is lash'd with woe.</div>
                              <div class="line">There's nothing situate under heaven's eye</div>
                              <div class="line">But hath his bound, in earth, in sea, in sky:</div>
                              <div class="line">The beasts, the fishes, and the winged fowls,</div>
                              <div class="line">Are their males' subjects and at their controls:</div>
                              <div class="line">Men, more divine, the masters of all these,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lords of the wide world and wild watery seas,</div>
                              <div class="line">Indued with intellectual sense and souls,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of more preeminence than fish and fowls,</div>
                              <div class="line">Are masters to their females, and their lords:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then let your will attend on their accords.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">This servitude makes you to keep unwed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Not this, but troubles of the marriage-bed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">But, were you wedded, you would bear some sway.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere I learn love, I'll practise to obey.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">How if your husband start some other where?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Till he come home again, I would forbear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience unmoved! no marvel though she pause;</div>
                              <div class="line">They can be meek that have no other cause.</div>
                              <div class="line">A wretched soul, bruised with adversity,</div>
                              <div class="line">We bid be quiet when we hear it cry;</div>
                              <div class="line">But were we burdened with like weight of pain,</div>
                              <div class="line">As much or more would we ourselves complain:</div>
                              <div class="line">So thou, that hast no unkind mate to grieve thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">With urging helpless patience wouldst relieve me,</div>
                              <div class="line">But, if thou live to see like right bereft,</div>
                              <div class="line">This fool-begg'd patience in thee will be left.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I will marry one day, but to try.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes your man; now is your husband nigh.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DROMIO of Ephesus</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, is your tardy master now at hand?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, he's at two hands with me, and that my two ears</div>
                              <div class="line">can witness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, didst thou speak with him? know'st thou his mind?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, ay, he told his mind upon mine ear:</div>
                              <div class="line">Beshrew his hand, I scarce could understand it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Spake he so doubtfully, thou couldst not feel his meaning?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, he struck so plainly, I could too well feel his</div>
                              <div class="line">blows; and withal so doubtfully that I could scarce</div>
                              <div class="line">understand them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">But say, I prithee, is he coming home? It seems he</div>
                              <div class="line">hath great care to please his wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, mistress, sure my master is horn-mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Horn-mad, thou villain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean not cuckold-mad;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, sure, he is stark mad.</div>
                              <div class="line">When I desired him to come home to dinner,</div>
                              <div class="line">He ask'd me for a thousand marks in gold:</div>
                              <div class="line">''Tis dinner-time,' quoth I; 'My gold!' quoth he;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Your meat doth burn,' quoth I; 'My gold!' quoth he:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Will you come home?' quoth I; 'My gold!' quoth he.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Where is the thousand marks I gave thee, villain?'</div>
                              <div class="line">'The pig,' quoth I, 'is burn'd;' 'My gold!' quoth he:</div>
                              <div class="line">'My mistress, sir' quoth I; 'Hang up thy mistress!</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not thy mistress; out on thy mistress!'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Quoth who?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Quoth my master:</div>
                              <div class="line">'I know,' quoth he, 'no house, no wife, no mistress.'</div>
                              <div class="line">So that my errand, due unto my tongue,</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank him, I bare home upon my shoulders;</div>
                              <div class="line">For, in conclusion, he did beat me there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go back again, thou slave, and fetch him home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go back again, and be new beaten home?</div>
                              <div class="line">For God's sake, send some other messenger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Back, slave, or I will break thy pate across.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And he will bless that cross with other beating:</div>
                              <div class="line">Between you I shall have a holy head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Hence, prating peasant! fetch thy master home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I so round with you as you with me,</div>
                              <div class="line">That like a football you do spurn me thus?</div>
                              <div class="line">You spurn me hence, and he will spurn me hither:</div>
                              <div class="line">If I last in this service, you must case me in leather.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, how impatience loureth in your face!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">His company must do his minions grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whilst I at home starve for a merry look.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath homely age the alluring beauty took</div>
                              <div class="line">From my poor cheek? then he hath wasted it:</div>
                              <div class="line">Are my discourses dull? barren my wit?</div>
                              <div class="line">If voluble and sharp discourse be marr'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unkindness blunts it more than marble hard:</div>
                              <div class="line">Do their gay vestments his affections bait?</div>
                              <div class="line">That's not my fault: he's master of my state:</div>
                              <div class="line">What ruins are in me that can be found,</div>
                              <div class="line">By him not ruin'd? then is he the ground</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my defeatures. My decayed fair</div>
                              <div class="line">A sunny look of his would soon repair</div>
                              <div class="line">But, too unruly deer, he breaks the pale</div>
                              <div class="line">And feeds from home; poor I am but his stale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Self-harming jealousy! fie, beat it hence!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Unfeeling fools can with such wrongs dispense.</div>
                              <div class="line">I know his eye doth homage otherwhere,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else what lets it but he would be here?</div>
                              <div class="line">Sister, you know he promised me a chain;</div>
                              <div class="line">Would that alone, alone he would detain,</div>
                              <div class="line">So he would keep fair quarter with his bed!</div>
                              <div class="line">I see the jewel best enamelled</div>
                              <div class="line">Will lose his beauty; yet the gold bides still,</div>
                              <div class="line">That others touch, and often touching will</div>
                              <div class="line">Wear gold: and no man that hath a name,</div>
                              <div class="line">By falsehood and corruption doth it shame.</div>
                              <div class="line">Since that my beauty cannot please his eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll weep what's left away, and weeping die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">How many fond fools serve mad jealousy!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A public place.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">The gold I gave to Dromio is laid up</div>
                              <div class="line">Safe at the Centaur; and the heedful slave</div>
                              <div class="line">Is wander'd forth, in care to seek me out</div>
                              <div class="line">By computation and mine host's report.</div>
                              <div class="line">I could not speak with Dromio since at first</div>
                              <div class="line">I sent him from the mart. See, here he comes.</div>
                              <p>Enter DROMIO of Syracuse</p>
                              <div class="line">How now sir! is your merry humour alter'd?</div>
                              <div class="line">As you love strokes, so jest with me again.</div>
                              <div class="line">You know no Centaur? you received no gold?</div>
                              <div class="line">Your mistress sent to have me home to dinner?</div>
                              <div class="line">My house was at the Phoenix? Wast thou mad,</div>
                              <div class="line">That thus so madly thou didst answer me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What answer, sir? when spake I such a word?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Even now, even here, not half an hour since.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I did not see you since you sent me hence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Home to the Centaur, with the gold you gave me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Villain, thou didst deny the gold's receipt,</div>
                              <div class="line">And told'st me of a mistress and a dinner;</div>
                              <div class="line">For which, I hope, thou felt'st I was displeased.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad to see you in this merry vein:</div>
                              <div class="line">What means this jest? I pray you, master, tell me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, dost thou jeer and flout me in the teeth?</div>
                              <div class="line">Think'st thou I jest? Hold, take thou that, and that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Beating him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold, sir, for God's sake! now your jest is earnest:</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon what bargain do you give it me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Because that I familiarly sometimes</div>
                              <div class="line">Do use you for my fool and chat with you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your sauciness will jest upon my love</div>
                              <div class="line">And make a common of my serious hours.</div>
                              <div class="line">When the sun shines let foolish gnats make sport,</div>
                              <div class="line">But creep in crannies when he hides his beams.</div>
                              <div class="line">If you will jest with me, know my aspect,</div>
                              <div class="line">And fashion your demeanor to my looks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I will beat this method in your sconce.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sconce call you it? so you would leave battering, I</div>
                              <div class="line">had rather have it a head: an you use these blows</div>
                              <div class="line">long, I must get a sconce for my head and ensconce</div>
                              <div class="line">it too; or else I shall seek my wit in my shoulders.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, I pray, sir why am I beaten?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou not know?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing, sir, but that I am beaten.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I tell you why?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir, and wherefore; for they say every why hath</div>
                              <div class="line">a wherefore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, first,--for flouting me; and then, wherefore--</div>
                              <div class="line">For urging it the second time to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Was there ever any man thus beaten out of season,</div>
                              <div class="line">When in the why and the wherefore is neither rhyme</div>
                              <div class="line">nor reason?</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, I thank you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thank me, sir, for what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, for this something that you gave me for nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll make you amends next, to give you nothing for</div>
                              <div class="line">something. But say, sir, is it dinner-time?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, sir; I think the meat wants that I have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">In good time, sir; what's that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Basting.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, then 'twill be dry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">If it be, sir, I pray you, eat none of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Your reason?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest it make you choleric and purchase me another</div>
                              <div class="line">dry basting.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, learn to jest in good time: there's a</div>
                              <div class="line">time for all things.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I durst have denied that, before you were so choleric.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">By what rule, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, by a rule as plain as the plain bald</div>
                              <div class="line">pate of father Time himself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's hear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">There's no time for a man to recover his hair that</div>
                              <div class="line">grows bald by nature.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">May he not do it by fine and recovery?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, to pay a fine for a periwig and recover the</div>
                              <div class="line">lost hair of another man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why is Time such a niggard of hair, being, as it is,</div>
                              <div class="line">so plentiful an excrement?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Because it is a blessing that he bestows on beasts;</div>
                              <div class="line">and what he hath scanted men in hair he hath given them in wit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, but there's many a man hath more hair than wit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Not a man of those but he hath the wit to lose his hair.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, thou didst conclude hairy men plain dealers without wit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">The plainer dealer, the sooner lost: yet he loseth</div>
                              <div class="line">it in a kind of jollity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">For what reason?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">For two; and sound ones too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, not sound, I pray you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sure ones, then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, not sure, in a thing falsing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Certain ones then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Name them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">The one, to save the money that he spends in</div>
                              <div class="line">trimming; the other, that at dinner they should not</div>
                              <div class="line">drop in his porridge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">You would all this time have proved there is no</div>
                              <div class="line">time for all things.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, and did, sir; namely, no time to recover hair</div>
                              <div class="line">lost by nature.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">But your reason was not substantial, why there is no</div>
                              <div class="line">time to recover.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus I mend it: Time himself is bald and therefore</div>
                              <div class="line">to the world's end will have bald followers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I knew 'twould be a bald conclusion:</div>
                              <div class="line">But, soft! who wafts us yonder?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ADRIANA and LUCIANA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, ay, Antipholus, look strange and frown:</div>
                              <div class="line">Some other mistress hath thy sweet aspects;</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not Adriana nor thy wife.</div>
                              <div class="line">The time was once when thou unurged wouldst vow</div>
                              <div class="line">That never words were music to thine ear,</div>
                              <div class="line">That never object pleasing in thine eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">That never touch well welcome to thy hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">That never meat sweet-savor'd in thy taste,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless I spake, or look'd, or touch'd, or carved to thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">How comes it now, my husband, O, how comes it,</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou art thus estranged from thyself?</div>
                              <div class="line">Thyself I call it, being strange to me,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, undividable, incorporate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Am better than thy dear self's better part.</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, do not tear away thyself from me!</div>
                              <div class="line">For know, my love, as easy mayest thou fall</div>
                              <div class="line">A drop of water in the breaking gulf,</div>
                              <div class="line">And take unmingled that same drop again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without addition or diminishing,</div>
                              <div class="line">As take from me thyself and not me too.</div>
                              <div class="line">How dearly would it touch me to the quick,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shouldst thou but hear I were licentious</div>
                              <div class="line">And that this body, consecrate to thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">By ruffian lust should be contaminate!</div>
                              <div class="line">Wouldst thou not spit at me and spurn at me</div>
                              <div class="line">And hurl the name of husband in my face</div>
                              <div class="line">And tear the stain'd skin off my harlot-brow</div>
                              <div class="line">And from my false hand cut the wedding-ring</div>
                              <div class="line">And break it with a deep-divorcing vow?</div>
                              <div class="line">I know thou canst; and therefore see thou do it.</div>
                              <div class="line">I am possess'd with an adulterate blot;</div>
                              <div class="line">My blood is mingled with the crime of lust:</div>
                              <div class="line">For if we too be one and thou play false,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do digest the poison of thy flesh,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being strumpeted by thy contagion.</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep then far league and truce with thy true bed;</div>
                              <div class="line">I live unstain'd, thou undishonoured.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Plead you to me, fair dame? I know you not:</div>
                              <div class="line">In Ephesus I am but two hours old,</div>
                              <div class="line">As strange unto your town as to your talk;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, every word by all my wit being scann'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Want wit in all one word to understand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, brother! how the world is changed with you!</div>
                              <div class="line">When were you wont to use my sister thus?</div>
                              <div class="line">She sent for you by Dromio home to dinner.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">By Dromio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">By me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">By thee; and this thou didst return from him,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he did buffet thee, and, in his blows,</div>
                              <div class="line">Denied my house for his, me for his wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you converse, sir, with this gentlewoman?</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the course and drift of your compact?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I, sir? I never saw her till this time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Villain, thou liest; for even her very words</div>
                              <div class="line">Didst thou deliver to me on the mart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I never spake with her in all my life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">How can she thus then call us by our names,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless it be by inspiration.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">How ill agrees it with your gravity</div>
                              <div class="line">To counterfeit thus grossly with your slave,</div>
                              <div class="line">Abetting him to thwart me in my mood!</div>
                              <div class="line">Be it my wrong you are from me exempt,</div>
                              <div class="line">But wrong not that wrong with a more contempt.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, I will fasten on this sleeve of thine:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art an elm, my husband, I a vine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose weakness, married to thy stronger state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes me with thy strength to communicate:</div>
                              <div class="line">If aught possess thee from me, it is dross,</div>
                              <div class="line">Usurping ivy, brier, or idle moss;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, all for want of pruning, with intrusion</div>
                              <div class="line">Infect thy sap and live on thy confusion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">To me she speaks; she moves me for her theme:</div>
                              <div class="line">What, was I married to her in my dream?</div>
                              <div class="line">Or sleep I now and think I hear all this?</div>
                              <div class="line">What error drives our eyes and ears amiss?</div>
                              <div class="line">Until I know this sure uncertainty,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll entertain the offer'd fallacy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Dromio, go bid the servants spread for dinner.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">O, for my beads! I cross me for a sinner.</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the fairy land: O spite of spites!</div>
                              <div class="line">We talk with goblins, owls and sprites:</div>
                              <div class="line">If we obey them not, this will ensue,</div>
                              <div class="line">They'll suck our breath, or pinch us black and blue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why pratest thou to thyself and answer'st not?</div>
                              <div class="line">Dromio, thou drone, thou snail, thou slug, thou sot!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am transformed, master, am I not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I think thou art in mind, and so am I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, master, both in mind and in my shape.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast thine own form.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I am an ape.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou art changed to aught, 'tis to an ass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis true; she rides me and I long for grass.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis so, I am an ass; else it could never be</div>
                              <div class="line">But I should know her as well as she knows me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, no longer will I be a fool,</div>
                              <div class="line">To put the finger in the eye and weep,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whilst man and master laugh my woes to scorn.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir, to dinner. Dromio, keep the gate.</div>
                              <div class="line">Husband, I'll dine above with you to-day</div>
                              <div class="line">And shrive you of a thousand idle pranks.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, if any ask you for your master,</div>
                              <div class="line">Say he dines forth, and let no creature enter.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sister. Dromio, play the porter well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I in earth, in heaven, or in hell?</div>
                              <div class="line">Sleeping or waking? mad or well-advised?</div>
                              <div class="line">Known unto these, and to myself disguised!</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll say as they say and persever so,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in this mist at all adventures go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, shall I be porter at the gate?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay; and let none enter, lest I break your pate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, Antipholus, we dine too late.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Before the house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  The same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Before the house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus, DROMIO of Ephesus,
ANGELO, and BALTHAZAR</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Signior Angelo, you must excuse us all;</div>
                              <div class="line">My wife is shrewish when I keep not hours:</div>
                              <div class="line">Say that I linger'd with you at your shop</div>
                              <div class="line">To see the making of her carcanet,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that to-morrow you will bring it home.</div>
                              <div class="line">But here's a villain that would face me down</div>
                              <div class="line">He met me on the mart, and that I beat him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And charged him with a thousand marks in gold,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that I did deny my wife and house.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou drunkard, thou, what didst thou mean by this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Say what you will, sir, but I know what I know;</div>
                              <div class="line">That you beat me at the mart, I have your hand to show:</div>
                              <div class="line">If the skin were parchment, and the blows you gave were ink,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your own handwriting would tell you what I think.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I think thou art an ass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, so it doth appear</div>
                              <div class="line">By the wrongs I suffer and the blows I bear.</div>
                              <div class="line">I should kick, being kick'd; and, being at that pass,</div>
                              <div class="line">You would keep from my heels and beware of an ass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You're sad, Signior Balthazar: pray God our cheer</div>
                              <div class="line">May answer my good will and your good welcome here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BALTHAZAR</div>
                              <div class="line">I hold your dainties cheap, sir, and your</div>
                              <div class="line">welcome dear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O, Signior Balthazar, either at flesh or fish,</div>
                              <div class="line">A table full of welcome make scarce one dainty dish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BALTHAZAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Good meat, sir, is common; that every churl affords.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And welcome more common; for that's nothing but words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BALTHAZAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Small cheer and great welcome makes a merry feast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, to a niggardly host, and more sparing guest:</div>
                              <div class="line">But though my cates be mean, take them in good part;</div>
                              <div class="line">Better cheer may you have, but not with better heart.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, soft! my door is lock'd. Go bid them let us in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Maud, Bridget, Marian, Cicel, Gillian, Ginn!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Mome, malt-horse, capon, coxcomb,</div>
                              <div class="line">idiot, patch!</div>
                              <div class="line">Either get thee from the door, or sit down at the hatch.</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou conjure for wenches, that thou call'st</div>
                              <div class="line">for such store,</div>
                              <div class="line">When one is one too many? Go, get thee from the door.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What patch is made our porter? My master stays in</div>
                              <div class="line">the street.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Let him walk from whence he came, lest he</div>
                              <div class="line">catch cold on's feet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Who talks within there? ho, open the door!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Right, sir; I'll tell you when, an you tell</div>
                              <div class="line">me wherefore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore? for my dinner: I have not dined to-day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Nor to-day here you must not; come again</div>
                              <div class="line">when you may.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What art thou that keepest me out from the house I owe?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  The porter for this time, sir, and my name</div>
                              <div class="line">is Dromio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O villain! thou hast stolen both mine office and my name.</div>
                              <div class="line">The one ne'er got me credit, the other mickle blame.</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou hadst been Dromio to-day in my place,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wouldst have changed thy face for a name or thy</div>
                              <div class="line">name for an ass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  What a coil is there, Dromio? who are those</div>
                              <div class="line">at the gate?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let my master in, Luce.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Faith, no; he comes too late;</div>
                              <div class="line">And so tell your master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, I must laugh!</div>
                              <div class="line">Have at you with a proverb--Shall I set in my staff?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
