                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Have at you with another; that's--When?</div>
                              <div class="line">can you tell?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  If thy name be call'd Luce--Luce, thou hast</div>
                              <div class="line">answered him well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you hear, you minion? you'll let us in, I hope?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  I thought to have asked you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  And you said no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">So, come, help: well struck! there was blow for blow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou baggage, let me in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Can you tell for whose sake?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, knock the door hard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Let him knock till it ache.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You'll cry for this, minion, if I beat the door down.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  What needs all that, and a pair of stocks in the town?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Who is that at the door that keeps all</div>
                              <div class="line">this noise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  By my troth, your town is troubled with</div>
                              <div class="line">unruly boys.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you there, wife? you might have come before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Your wife, sir knave! go get you from the door.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">If you went in pain, master, this 'knave' would go sore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is neither cheer, sir, nor welcome: we would</div>
                              <div class="line">fain have either.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BALTHAZAR</div>
                              <div class="line">In debating which was best, we shall part with neither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">They stand at the door, master; bid them welcome hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">There is something in the wind, that we cannot get in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You would say so, master, if your garments were thin.</div>
                              <div class="line">Your cake there is warm within; you stand here in the cold:</div>
                              <div class="line">It would make a man mad as a buck, to be so bought and sold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go fetch me something: I'll break ope the gate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Break any breaking here, and I'll break your</div>
                              <div class="line">knave's pate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A man may break a word with you, sir, and words are but wind,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and break it in your face, so he break it not behind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  It seems thou want'st breaking: out upon</div>
                              <div class="line">thee, hind!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's too much 'out upon thee!' I pray thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">let me in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Ay, when fowls have no feathers and fish have no fin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I'll break in: go borrow me a crow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A crow without feather? Master, mean you so?</div>
                              <div class="line">For a fish without a fin, there's a fowl without a feather;</div>
                              <div class="line">If a crow help us in, sirrah, we'll pluck a crow together.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go get thee gone; fetch me an iron crow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BALTHAZAR</div>
                              <div class="line">Have patience, sir; O, let it not be so!</div>
                              <div class="line">Herein you war against your reputation</div>
                              <div class="line">And draw within the compass of suspect</div>
                              <div class="line">The unviolated honour of your wife.</div>
                              <div class="line">Once this,--your long experience of her wisdom,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her sober virtue, years and modesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Plead on her part some cause to you unknown:</div>
                              <div class="line">And doubt not, sir, but she will well excuse</div>
                              <div class="line">Why at this time the doors are made against you.</div>
                              <div class="line">Be ruled by me: depart in patience,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let us to the Tiger all to dinner,</div>
                              <div class="line">And about evening come yourself alone</div>
                              <div class="line">To know the reason of this strange restraint.</div>
                              <div class="line">If by strong hand you offer to break in</div>
                              <div class="line">Now in the stirring passage of the day,</div>
                              <div class="line">A vulgar comment will be made of it,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that supposed by the common rout</div>
                              <div class="line">Against your yet ungalled estimation</div>
                              <div class="line">That may with foul intrusion enter in</div>
                              <div class="line">And dwell upon your grave when you are dead;</div>
                              <div class="line">For slander lives upon succession,</div>
                              <div class="line">For ever housed where it gets possession.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You have prevailed: I will depart in quiet,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, in despite of mirth, mean to be merry.</div>
                              <div class="line">I know a wench of excellent discourse,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pretty and witty; wild, and yet, too, gentle:</div>
                              <div class="line">There will we dine. This woman that I mean,</div>
                              <div class="line">My wife--but, I protest, without desert--</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath oftentimes upbraided me withal:</div>
                              <div class="line">To her will we to dinner.</div>
                              <p>To Angelo</p>
                              <div class="line">Get you home</div>
                              <div class="line">And fetch the chain; by this I know 'tis made:</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring it, I pray you, to the Porpentine;</div>
                              <div class="line">For there's the house: that chain will I bestow--</div>
                              <div class="line">Be it for nothing but to spite my wife--</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon mine hostess there: good sir, make haste.</div>
                              <div class="line">Since mine own doors refuse to entertain me,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll knock elsewhere, to see if they'll disdain me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll meet you at that place some hour hence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so. This jest shall cost me some expense.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LUCIANA and ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">And may it be that you have quite forgot</div>
                              <div class="line">A husband's office? shall, Antipholus.</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in the spring of love, thy love-springs rot?</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall love, in building, grow so ruinous?</div>
                              <div class="line">If you did wed my sister for her wealth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Then for her wealth's sake use her with more kindness:</div>
                              <div class="line">Or if you like elsewhere, do it by stealth;</div>
                              <div class="line">Muffle your false love with some show of blindness:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let not my sister read it in your eye;</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not thy tongue thy own shame's orator;</div>
                              <div class="line">Look sweet, be fair, become disloyalty;</div>
                              <div class="line">Apparel vice like virtue's harbinger;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bear a fair presence, though your heart be tainted;</div>
                              <div class="line">Teach sin the carriage of a holy saint;</div>
                              <div class="line">Be secret-false: what need she be acquainted?</div>
                              <div class="line">What simple thief brags of his own attaint?</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis double wrong, to truant with your bed</div>
                              <div class="line">And let her read it in thy looks at board:</div>
                              <div class="line">Shame hath a bastard fame, well managed;</div>
                              <div class="line">Ill deeds are doubled with an evil word.</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, poor women! make us but believe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being compact of credit, that you love us;</div>
                              <div class="line">Though others have the arm, show us the sleeve;</div>
                              <div class="line">We in your motion turn and you may move us.</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, gentle brother, get you in again;</div>
                              <div class="line">Comfort my sister, cheer her, call her wife:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis holy sport to be a little vain,</div>
                              <div class="line">When the sweet breath of flattery conquers strife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet mistress--what your name is else, I know not,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor by what wonder you do hit of mine,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Less in your knowledge and your grace you show not</div>
                              <div class="line">Than our earth's wonder, more than earth divine.</div>
                              <div class="line">Teach me, dear creature, how to think and speak;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay open to my earthy-gross conceit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Smother'd in errors, feeble, shallow, weak,</div>
                              <div class="line">The folded meaning of your words' deceit.</div>
                              <div class="line">Against my soul's pure truth why labour you</div>
                              <div class="line">To make it wander in an unknown field?</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you a god? would you create me new?</div>
                              <div class="line">Transform me then, and to your power I'll yield.</div>
                              <div class="line">But if that I am I, then well I know</div>
                              <div class="line">Your weeping sister is no wife of mine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor to her bed no homage do I owe</div>
                              <div class="line">Far more, far more to you do I decline.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, train me not, sweet mermaid, with thy note,</div>
                              <div class="line">To drown me in thy sister's flood of tears:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sing, siren, for thyself and I will dote:</div>
                              <div class="line">Spread o'er the silver waves thy golden hairs,</div>
                              <div class="line">And as a bed I'll take them and there lie,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in that glorious supposition think</div>
                              <div class="line">He gains by death that hath such means to die:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let Love, being light, be drowned if she sink!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">What, are you mad, that you do reason so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Not mad, but mated; how, I do not know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a fault that springeth from your eye.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">For gazing on your beams, fair sun, being by.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Gaze where you should, and that will clear your sight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">As good to wink, sweet love, as look on night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why call you me love? call my sister so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy sister's sister.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">That's my sister.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">No;</div>
                              <div class="line">It is thyself, mine own self's better part,</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine eye's clear eye, my dear heart's dearer heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">My food, my fortune and my sweet hope's aim,</div>
                              <div class="line">My sole earth's heaven and my heaven's claim.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">All this my sister is, or else should be.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Call thyself sister, sweet, for I am thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thee will I love and with thee lead my life:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast no husband yet nor I no wife.</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me thy hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, soft, air! hold you still:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll fetch my sister, to get her good will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter DROMIO of Syracuse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, Dromio! where runn'st thou so fast?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you know me, sir? am I Dromio? am I your man?</div>
                              <div class="line">am I myself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art Dromio, thou art my man, thou art thyself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am an ass, I am a woman's man and besides myself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, besides myself, I am due to a woman; one</div>
                              <div class="line">that claims me, one that haunts me, one that will have me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What claim lays she to thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry sir, such claim as you would lay to your</div>
                              <div class="line">horse; and she would have me as a beast: not that, I</div>
                              <div class="line">being a beast, she would have me; but that she,</div>
                              <div class="line">being a very beastly creature, lays claim to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What is she?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">A very reverent body; ay, such a one as a man may</div>
                              <div class="line">not speak of without he say 'Sir-reverence.' I have</div>
                              <div class="line">but lean luck in the match, and yet is she a</div>
                              <div class="line">wondrous fat marriage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">How dost thou mean a fat marriage?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, she's the kitchen wench and all grease;</div>
                              <div class="line">and I know not what use to put her to but to make a</div>
                              <div class="line">lamp of her and run from her by her own light. I</div>
                              <div class="line">warrant, her rags and the tallow in them will burn a</div>
                              <div class="line">Poland winter: if she lives till doomsday,</div>
                              <div class="line">she'll burn a week longer than the whole world.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What complexion is she of?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Swart, like my shoe, but her face nothing half so</div>
                              <div class="line">clean kept: for why, she sweats; a man may go over</div>
                              <div class="line">shoes in the grime of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">That's a fault that water will mend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, sir, 'tis in grain; Noah's flood could not do it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What's her name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nell, sir; but her name and three quarters, that's</div>
                              <div class="line">an ell and three quarters, will not measure her from</div>
                              <div class="line">hip to hip.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Then she bears some breadth?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">No longer from head to foot than from hip to hip:</div>
                              <div class="line">she is spherical, like a globe; I could find out</div>
                              <div class="line">countries in her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">In what part of her body stands Ireland?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, in her buttocks: I found it out by the bogs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Where Scotland?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I found it by the barrenness; hard in the palm of the hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Where France?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">In her forehead; armed and reverted, making war</div>
                              <div class="line">against her heir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Where England?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I looked for the chalky cliffs, but I could find no</div>
                              <div class="line">whiteness in them; but I guess it stood in her chin,</div>
                              <div class="line">by the salt rheum that ran between France and it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Where Spain?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, I saw it not; but I felt it hot in her breath.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Where America, the Indies?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Oh, sir, upon her nose all o'er embellished with</div>
                              <div class="line">rubies, carbuncles, sapphires, declining their rich</div>
                              <div class="line">aspect to the hot breath of Spain; who sent whole</div>
                              <div class="line">armadoes of caracks to be ballast at her nose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Where stood Belgia, the Netherlands?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Oh, sir, I did not look so low. To conclude, this</div>
                              <div class="line">drudge, or diviner, laid claim to me, call'd me</div>
                              <div class="line">Dromio; swore I was assured to her; told me what</div>
                              <div class="line">privy marks I had about me, as, the mark of my</div>
                              <div class="line">shoulder, the mole in my neck, the great wart on my</div>
                              <div class="line">left arm, that I amazed ran from her as a witch:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, I think, if my breast had not been made of</div>
                              <div class="line">faith and my heart of steel,</div>
                              <div class="line">She had transform'd me to a curtal dog and made</div>
                              <div class="line">me turn i' the wheel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Go hie thee presently, post to the road:</div>
                              <div class="line">An if the wind blow any way from shore,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not harbour in this town to-night:</div>
                              <div class="line">If any bark put forth, come to the mart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where I will walk till thou return to me.</div>
                              <div class="line">If every one knows us and we know none,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis time, I think, to trudge, pack and be gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">As from a bear a man would run for life,</div>
                              <div class="line">So fly I from her that would be my wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">There's none but witches do inhabit here;</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore 'tis high time that I were hence.</div>
                              <div class="line">She that doth call me husband, even my soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth for a wife abhor. But her fair sister,</div>
                              <div class="line">Possess'd with such a gentle sovereign grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of such enchanting presence and discourse,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath almost made me traitor to myself:</div>
                              <div class="line">But, lest myself be guilty to self-wrong,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll stop mine ears against the mermaid's song.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ANGELO with the chain</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Antipholus,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, that's my name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know it well, sir, lo, here is the chain.</div>
                              <div class="line">I thought to have ta'en you at the Porpentine:</div>
                              <div class="line">The chain unfinish'd made me stay thus long.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your will that I shall do with this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">What please yourself, sir: I have made it for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Made it for me, sir! I bespoke it not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not once, nor twice, but twenty times you have.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go home with it and please your wife withal;</div>
                              <div class="line">And soon at supper-time I'll visit you</div>
                              <div class="line">And then receive my money for the chain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, sir, receive the money now,</div>
                              <div class="line">For fear you ne'er see chain nor money more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">You are a merry man, sir: fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What I should think of this, I cannot tell:</div>
                              <div class="line">But this I think, there's no man is so vain</div>
                              <div class="line">That would refuse so fair an offer'd chain.</div>
                              <div class="line">I see a man here needs not live by shifts,</div>
                              <div class="line">When in the streets he meets such golden gifts.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll to the mart, and there for Dromio stay</div>
                              <div class="line">If any ship put out, then straight away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  A public place.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  The house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  A public place.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.5">4. SCENE IV.  A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A public place.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter Second Merchant, ANGELO, and an Officer</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">You know since Pentecost the sum is due,</div>
                              <div class="line">And since I have not much importuned you;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor now I had not, but that I am bound</div>
                              <div class="line">To Persia, and want guilders for my voyage:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore make present satisfaction,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I'll attach you by this officer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Even just the sum that I do owe to you</div>
                              <div class="line">Is growing to me by Antipholus,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the instant that I met with you</div>
                              <div class="line">He had of me a chain: at five o'clock</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall receive the money for the same.</div>
                              <div class="line">Pleaseth you walk with me down to his house,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will discharge my bond and thank you too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus and DROMIO of Ephesus
from the courtezan's</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">That labour may you save: see where he comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">While I go to the goldsmith's house, go thou</div>
                              <div class="line">And buy a rope's end: that will I bestow</div>
                              <div class="line">Among my wife and her confederates,</div>
                              <div class="line">For locking me out of my doors by day.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, soft! I see the goldsmith. Get thee gone;</div>
                              <div class="line">Buy thou a rope and bring it home to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I buy a thousand pound a year: I buy a rope.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A man is well holp up that trusts to you:</div>
                              <div class="line">I promised your presence and the chain;</div>
                              <div class="line">But neither chain nor goldsmith came to me.</div>
                              <div class="line">Belike you thought our love would last too long,</div>
                              <div class="line">If it were chain'd together, and therefore came not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Saving your merry humour, here's the note</div>
                              <div class="line">How much your chain weighs to the utmost carat,</div>
                              <div class="line">The fineness of the gold and chargeful fashion.</div>
                              <div class="line">Which doth amount to three odd ducats more</div>
                              <div class="line">Than I stand debted to this gentleman:</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, see him presently discharged,</div>
                              <div class="line">For he is bound to sea and stays but for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not furnish'd with the present money;</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides, I have some business in the town.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good signior, take the stranger to my house</div>
                              <div class="line">And with you take the chain and bid my wife</div>
                              <div class="line">Disburse the sum on the receipt thereof:</div>
                              <div class="line">Perchance I will be there as soon as you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then you will bring the chain to her yourself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No; bear it with you, lest I come not time enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, I will. Have you the chain about you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">An if I have not, sir, I hope you have;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else you may return without your money.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, come, I pray you, sir, give me the chain:</div>
                              <div class="line">Both wind and tide stays for this gentleman,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I, to blame, have held him here too long.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Lord! you use this dalliance to excuse</div>
                              <div class="line">Your breach of promise to the Porpentine.</div>
                              <div class="line">I should have chid you for not bringing it,</div>
                              <div class="line">But, like a shrew, you first begin to brawl.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">The hour steals on; I pray you, sir, dispatch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">You hear how he importunes me;--the chain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, give it to my wife and fetch your money.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, you know I gave it you even now.</div>
                              <div class="line">Either send the chain or send me by some token.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, now you run this humour out of breath,</div>
                              <div class="line">where's the chain? I pray you, let me see it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">My business cannot brook this dalliance.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good sir, say whether you'll answer me or no:</div>
                              <div class="line">If not, I'll leave him to the officer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I answer you! what should I answer you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">The money that you owe me for the chain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I owe you none till I receive the chain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">You know I gave it you half an hour since.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You gave me none: you wrong me much to say so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">You wrong me more, sir, in denying it:</div>
                              <div class="line">Consider how it stands upon my credit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, officer, arrest him at my suit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">I do; and charge you in the duke's name to obey me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">This touches me in reputation.</div>
                              <div class="line">Either consent to pay this sum for me</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I attach you by this officer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Consent to pay thee that I never had!</div>
                              <div class="line">Arrest me, foolish fellow, if thou darest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is thy fee; arrest him, officer,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not spare my brother in this case,</div>
                              <div class="line">If he should scorn me so apparently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">I do arrest you, sir: you hear the suit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I do obey thee till I give thee bail.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, sirrah, you shall buy this sport as dear</div>
                              <div class="line">As all the metal in your shop will answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, sir, I will have law in Ephesus,</div>
                              <div class="line">To your notorious shame; I doubt it not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DROMIO of Syracuse, from the bay</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, there is a bark of Epidamnum</div>
                              <div class="line">That stays but till her owner comes aboard,</div>
                              <div class="line">And then, sir, she bears away. Our fraughtage, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have convey'd aboard; and I have bought</div>
                              <div class="line">The oil, the balsamum and aqua-vitae.</div>
                              <div class="line">The ship is in her trim; the merry wind</div>
                              <div class="line">Blows fair from land: they stay for nought at all</div>
                              <div class="line">But for their owner, master, and yourself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! a madman! Why, thou peevish sheep,</div>
                              <div class="line">What ship of Epidamnum stays for me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">A ship you sent me to, to hire waftage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou drunken slave, I sent thee for a rope;</div>
                              <div class="line">And told thee to what purpose and what end.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">You sent me for a rope's end as soon:</div>
                              <div class="line">You sent me to the bay, sir, for a bark.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I will debate this matter at more leisure</div>
                              <div class="line">And teach your ears to list me with more heed.</div>
                              <div class="line">To Adriana, villain, hie thee straight:</div>
                              <div class="line">Give her this key, and tell her, in the desk</div>
                              <div class="line">That's cover'd o'er with Turkish tapestry,</div>
                              <div class="line">There is a purse of ducats; let her send it:</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell her I am arrested in the street</div>
                              <div class="line">And that shall bail me; hie thee, slave, be gone!</div>
                              <div class="line">On, officer, to prison till it come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Second Merchant, Angelo, Officer, and
Antipholus of Ephesus</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">To Adriana! that is where we dined,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where Dowsabel did claim me for her husband:</div>
                              <div class="line">She is too big, I hope, for me to compass.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thither I must, although against my will,</div>
                              <div class="line">For servants must their masters' minds fulfil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ADRIANA and LUCIANA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, Luciana, did he tempt thee so?</div>
                              <div class="line">Mightst thou perceive austerely in his eye</div>
                              <div class="line">That he did plead in earnest? yea or no?</div>
                              <div class="line">Look'd he or red or pale, or sad or merrily?</div>
                              <div class="line">What observation madest thou in this case</div>
                              <div class="line">Of his heart's meteors tilting in his face?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">First he denied you had in him no right.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">He meant he did me none; the more my spite.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then swore he that he was a stranger here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">And true he swore, though yet forsworn he were.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then pleaded I for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">And what said he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">That love I begg'd for you he begg'd of me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">With what persuasion did he tempt thy love?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">With words that in an honest suit might move.</div>
                              <div class="line">First he did praise my beauty, then my speech.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Didst speak him fair?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Have patience, I beseech.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot, nor I will not, hold me still;</div>
                              <div class="line">My tongue, though not my heart, shall have his will.</div>
                              <div class="line">He is deformed, crooked, old and sere,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ill-faced, worse bodied, shapeless everywhere;</div>
                              <div class="line">Vicious, ungentle, foolish, blunt, unkind;</div>
                              <div class="line">Stigmatical in making, worse in mind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Who would be jealous then of such a one?</div>
                              <div class="line">No evil lost is wail'd when it is gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, but I think him better than I say,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet would herein others' eyes were worse.</div>
                              <div class="line">Far from her nest the lapwing cries away:</div>
                              <div class="line">My heart prays for him, though my tongue do curse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DROMIO of Syracuse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Here! go; the desk, the purse! sweet, now, make haste.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">How hast thou lost thy breath?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">By running fast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
