                              <div class="line">Where is thy master, Dromio? is he well?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, he's in Tartar limbo, worse than hell.</div>
                              <div class="line">A devil in an everlasting garment hath him;</div>
                              <div class="line">One whose hard heart is button'd up with steel;</div>
                              <div class="line">A fiend, a fury, pitiless and rough;</div>
                              <div class="line">A wolf, nay, worse, a fellow all in buff;</div>
                              <div class="line">A back-friend, a shoulder-clapper, one that</div>
                              <div class="line">countermands</div>
                              <div class="line">The passages of alleys, creeks and narrow lands;</div>
                              <div class="line">A hound that runs counter and yet draws dryfoot well;</div>
                              <div class="line">One that before the judgement carries poor souls to hell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, man, what is the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not know the matter: he is 'rested on the case.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">What, is he arrested? Tell me at whose suit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not at whose suit he is arrested well;</div>
                              <div class="line">But he's in a suit of buff which 'rested him, that can I tell.</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you send him, mistress, redemption, the money in his desk?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go fetch it, sister.</div>
                              <p>Exit Luciana</p>
                              <div class="line">This I wonder at,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he, unknown to me, should be in debt.</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, was he arrested on a band?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Not on a band, but on a stronger thing;</div>
                              <div class="line">A chain, a chain! Do you not hear it ring?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">What, the chain?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no, the bell: 'tis time that I were gone:</div>
                              <div class="line">It was two ere I left him, and now the clock</div>
                              <div class="line">strikes one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">The hours come back! that did I never hear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">O, yes; if any hour meet a sergeant, a' turns back for</div>
                              <div class="line">very fear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">As if Time were in debt! how fondly dost thou reason!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Time is a very bankrupt, and owes more than he's</div>
                              <div class="line">worth, to season.</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, he's a thief too: have you not heard men say</div>
                              <div class="line">That Time comes stealing on by night and day?</div>
                              <div class="line">If Time be in debt and theft, and a sergeant in the way,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath he not reason to turn back an hour in a day?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter LUCIANA with a purse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, Dromio; there's the money, bear it straight;</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring thy master home immediately.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sister: I am press'd down with conceit--</div>
                              <div class="line">Conceit, my comfort and my injury.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A public place.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">There's not a man I meet but doth salute me</div>
                              <div class="line">As if I were their well-acquainted friend;</div>
                              <div class="line">And every one doth call me by my name.</div>
                              <div class="line">Some tender money to me; some invite me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Some other give me thanks for kindnesses;</div>
                              <div class="line">Some offer me commodities to buy:</div>
                              <div class="line">Even now a tailor call'd me in his shop</div>
                              <div class="line">And show'd me silks that he had bought for me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And therewithal took measure of my body.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sure, these are but imaginary wiles</div>
                              <div class="line">And Lapland sorcerers inhabit here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, here's the gold you sent me for. What, have</div>
                              <div class="line">you got the picture of old Adam new-apparelled?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What gold is this? what Adam dost thou mean?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Not that Adam that kept the Paradise but that Adam</div>
                              <div class="line">that keeps the prison: he that goes in the calf's</div>
                              <div class="line">skin that was killed for the Prodigal; he that came</div>
                              <div class="line">behind you, sir, like an evil angel, and bid you</div>
                              <div class="line">forsake your liberty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I understand thee not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">No? why, 'tis a plain case: he that went, like a</div>
                              <div class="line">bass-viol, in a case of leather; the man, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">that, when gentlemen are tired, gives them a sob</div>
                              <div class="line">and 'rests them; he, sir, that takes pity on decayed</div>
                              <div class="line">men and gives them suits of durance; he that sets up</div>
                              <div class="line">his rest to do more exploits with his mace than a</div>
                              <div class="line">morris-pike.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">What, thou meanest an officer?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir, the sergeant of the band, he that brings</div>
                              <div class="line">any man to answer it that breaks his band; one that</div>
                              <div class="line">thinks a man always going to bed, and says, 'God</div>
                              <div class="line">give you good rest!'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, there rest in your foolery. Is there any</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, I brought you word an hour since that the</div>
                              <div class="line">bark Expedition put forth to-night; and then were</div>
                              <div class="line">you hindered by the sergeant, to tarry for the hoy</div>
                              <div class="line">Delay. Here are the angels that you sent for to</div>
                              <div class="line">deliver you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">The fellow is distract, and so am I;</div>
                              <div class="line">And here we wander in illusions:</div>
                              <div class="line">Some blessed power deliver us from hence!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Courtezan</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Courtezan</div>
                              <div class="line">Well met, well met, Master Antipholus.</div>
                              <div class="line">I see, sir, you have found the goldsmith now:</div>
                              <div class="line">Is that the chain you promised me to-day?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Satan, avoid! I charge thee, tempt me not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, is this Mistress Satan?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the devil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, she is worse, she is the devil's dam; and here</div>
                              <div class="line">she comes in the habit of a light wench: and thereof</div>
                              <div class="line">comes that the wenches say 'God damn me;' that's as</div>
                              <div class="line">much to say 'God make me a light wench.' It is</div>
                              <div class="line">written, they appear to men like angels of light:</div>
                              <div class="line">light is an effect of fire, and fire will burn;</div>
                              <div class="line">ergo, light wenches will burn. Come not near her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Courtezan</div>
                              <div class="line">Your man and you are marvellous merry, sir.</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you go with me? We'll mend our dinner here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, if you do, expect spoon-meat; or bespeak a</div>
                              <div class="line">long spoon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, Dromio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, he must have a long spoon that must eat with</div>
                              <div class="line">the devil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Avoid then, fiend! what tell'st thou me of supping?</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art, as you are all, a sorceress:</div>
                              <div class="line">I conjure thee to leave me and be gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Courtezan</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me the ring of mine you had at dinner,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or, for my diamond, the chain you promised,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I'll be gone, sir, and not trouble you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Some devils ask but the parings of one's nail,</div>
                              <div class="line">A rush, a hair, a drop of blood, a pin,</div>
                              <div class="line">A nut, a cherry-stone;</div>
                              <div class="line">But she, more covetous, would have a chain.</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, be wise: an if you give it her,</div>
                              <div class="line">The devil will shake her chain and fright us with it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Courtezan</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, sir, my ring, or else the chain:</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope you do not mean to cheat me so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Avaunt, thou witch! Come, Dromio, let us go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">'Fly pride,' says the peacock: mistress, that you know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Antipholus of Syracuse and Dromio of Syracuse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Courtezan</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, out of doubt Antipholus is mad,</div>
                              <div class="line">Else would he never so demean himself.</div>
                              <div class="line">A ring he hath of mine worth forty ducats,</div>
                              <div class="line">And for the same he promised me a chain:</div>
                              <div class="line">Both one and other he denies me now.</div>
                              <div class="line">The reason that I gather he is mad,</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides this present instance of his rage,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is a mad tale he told to-day at dinner,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of his own doors being shut against his entrance.</div>
                              <div class="line">Belike his wife, acquainted with his fits,</div>
                              <div class="line">On purpose shut the doors against his way.</div>
                              <div class="line">My way is now to hie home to his house,</div>
                              <div class="line">And tell his wife that, being lunatic,</div>
                              <div class="line">He rush'd into my house and took perforce</div>
                              <div class="line">My ring away. This course I fittest choose;</div>
                              <div class="line">For forty ducats is too much to lose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus and the Officer</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fear me not, man; I will not break away:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll give thee, ere I leave thee, so much money,</div>
                              <div class="line">To warrant thee, as I am 'rested for.</div>
                              <div class="line">My wife is in a wayward mood to-day,</div>
                              <div class="line">And will not lightly trust the messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">That I should be attach'd in Ephesus,</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell you, 'twill sound harshly in her ears.</div>
                              <p>Enter DROMIO of Ephesus with a rope's-end</p>
                              <div class="line">Here comes my man; I think he brings the money.</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, sir! have you that I sent you for?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's that, I warrant you, will pay them all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">But where's the money?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, I gave the money for the rope.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Five hundred ducats, villain, for a rope?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll serve you, sir, five hundred at the rate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">To what end did I bid thee hie thee home?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">To a rope's-end, sir; and to that end am I returned.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And to that end, sir, I will welcome you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Beating him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">Good sir, be patient.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, 'tis for me to be patient; I am in adversity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">Good, now, hold thy tongue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, rather persuade him to hold his hands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou whoreson, senseless villain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I would I were senseless, sir, that I might not feel</div>
                              <div class="line">your blows.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I am an ass, indeed; you may prove it by my long</div>
                              <div class="line">ears. I have served him from the hour of my</div>
                              <div class="line">nativity to this instant, and have nothing at his</div>
                              <div class="line">hands for my service but blows. When I am cold, he</div>
                              <div class="line">heats me with beating; when I am warm, he cools me</div>
                              <div class="line">with beating; I am waked with it when I sleep;</div>
                              <div class="line">raised with it when I sit; driven out of doors with</div>
                              <div class="line">it when I go from home; welcomed home with it when</div>
                              <div class="line">I return; nay, I bear it on my shoulders, as a</div>
                              <div class="line">beggar wont her brat; and, I think when he hath</div>
                              <div class="line">lamed me, I shall beg with it from door to door.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, go along; my wife is coming yonder.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ADRIANA, LUCIANA, the Courtezan, and PINCH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress, 'respice finem,' respect your end; or</div>
                              <div class="line">rather, the prophecy like the parrot, 'beware the</div>
                              <div class="line">rope's-end.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou still talk?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Beating him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Courtezan</div>
                              <div class="line">How say you now? is not your husband mad?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">His incivility confirms no less.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Doctor Pinch, you are a conjurer;</div>
                              <div class="line">Establish him in his true sense again,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will please you what you will demand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, how fiery and how sharp he looks!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Courtezan</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark how he trembles in his ecstasy!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PINCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me your hand and let me feel your pulse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">There is my hand, and let it feel your ear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Striking him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PINCH</div>
                              <div class="line">I charge thee, Satan, housed within this man,</div>
                              <div class="line">To yield possession to my holy prayers</div>
                              <div class="line">And to thy state of darkness hie thee straight:</div>
                              <div class="line">I conjure thee by all the saints in heaven!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, doting wizard, peace! I am not mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, that thou wert not, poor distressed soul!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You minion, you, are these your customers?</div>
                              <div class="line">Did this companion with the saffron face</div>
                              <div class="line">Revel and feast it at my house to-day,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whilst upon me the guilty doors were shut</div>
                              <div class="line">And I denied to enter in my house?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">O husband, God doth know you dined at home;</div>
                              <div class="line">Where would you had remain'd until this time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Free from these slanders and this open shame!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Dined at home! Thou villain, what sayest thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, sooth to say, you did not dine at home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Were not my doors lock'd up and I shut out?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Perdie, your doors were lock'd and you shut out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And did not she herself revile me there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sans fable, she herself reviled you there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Did not her kitchen-maid rail, taunt, and scorn me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Certes, she did; the kitchen-vestal scorn'd you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And did not I in rage depart from thence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">In verity you did; my bones bear witness,</div>
                              <div class="line">That since have felt the vigour of his rage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't good to soothe him in these contraries?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PINCH</div>
                              <div class="line">It is no shame: the fellow finds his vein,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yielding to him humours well his frenzy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast suborn'd the goldsmith to arrest me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, I sent you money to redeem you,</div>
                              <div class="line">By Dromio here, who came in haste for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Money by me! heart and goodwill you might;</div>
                              <div class="line">But surely master, not a rag of money.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Went'st not thou to her for a purse of ducats?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">He came to me and I deliver'd it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">And I am witness with her that she did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">God and the rope-maker bear me witness</div>
                              <div class="line">That I was sent for nothing but a rope!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PINCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress, both man and master is possess'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">I know it by their pale and deadly looks:</div>
                              <div class="line">They must be bound and laid in some dark room.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, wherefore didst thou lock me forth to-day?</div>
                              <div class="line">And why dost thou deny the bag of gold?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I did not, gentle husband, lock thee forth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And, gentle master, I received no gold;</div>
                              <div class="line">But I confess, sir, that we were lock'd out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Dissembling villain, thou speak'st false in both.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Dissembling harlot, thou art false in all;</div>
                              <div class="line">And art confederate with a damned pack</div>
                              <div class="line">To make a loathsome abject scorn of me:</div>
                              <div class="line">But with these nails I'll pluck out these false eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">That would behold in me this shameful sport.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter three or four, and offer to bind him.
He strives</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, bind him, bind him! let him not come near me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PINCH</div>
                              <div class="line">More company! The fiend is strong within him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay me, poor man, how pale and wan he looks!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What, will you murder me? Thou gaoler, thou,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am thy prisoner: wilt thou suffer them</div>
                              <div class="line">To make a rescue?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">Masters, let him go</div>
                              <div class="line">He is my prisoner, and you shall not have him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PINCH</div>
                              <div class="line">Go bind this man, for he is frantic too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They offer to bind Dromio of Ephesus</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">What wilt thou do, thou peevish officer?</div>
                              <div class="line">Hast thou delight to see a wretched man</div>
                              <div class="line">Do outrage and displeasure to himself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">He is my prisoner: if I let him go,</div>
                              <div class="line">The debt he owes will be required of me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will discharge thee ere I go from thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">Bear me forthwith unto his creditor,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, knowing how the debt grows, I will pay it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good master doctor, see him safe convey'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Home to my house. O most unhappy day!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O most unhappy strumpet!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, I am here entered in bond for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Out on thee, villain! wherefore dost thou mad me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF EPHESUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you be bound for nothing? be mad, good master:</div>
                              <div class="line">cry 'The devil!'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">God help, poor souls, how idly do they talk!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go bear him hence. Sister, go you with me.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt all but Adriana, Luciana, Officer and
Courtezan</p>
                              <div class="line">Say now, whose suit is he arrested at?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">One Angelo, a goldsmith: do you know him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I know the man. What is the sum he owes?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">Two hundred ducats.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, how grows it due?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">Due for a chain your husband had of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">He did bespeak a chain for me, but had it not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Courtezan</div>
                              <div class="line">When as your husband all in rage to-day</div>
                              <div class="line">Came to my house and took away my ring--</div>
                              <div class="line">The ring I saw upon his finger now--</div>
                              <div class="line">Straight after did I meet him with a chain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">It may be so, but I did never see it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, gaoler, bring me where the goldsmith is:</div>
                              <div class="line">I long to know the truth hereof at large.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse with his rapier drawn,
and DROMIO of Syracuse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">God, for thy mercy! they are loose again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">And come with naked swords.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's call more help to have them bound again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">Away! they'll kill us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but Antipholus of Syracuse and Dromio
of Syracuse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I see these witches are afraid of swords.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">She that would be your wife now ran from you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come to the Centaur; fetch our stuff from thence:</div>
                              <div class="line">I long that we were safe and sound aboard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, stay here this night; they will surely do us</div>
                              <div class="line">no harm: you saw they speak us fair, give us gold:</div>
                              <div class="line">methinks they are such a gentle nation that, but for</div>
                              <div class="line">the mountain of mad flesh that claims marriage of</div>
                              <div class="line">me, I could find in my heart to stay here still and</div>
                              <div class="line">turn witch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not stay to-night for all the town;</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore away, to get our stuff aboard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter Second Merchant and ANGELO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sorry, sir, that I have hinder'd you;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, I protest, he had the chain of me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though most dishonestly he doth deny it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">How is the man esteemed here in the city?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Of very reverend reputation, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of credit infinite, highly beloved,</div>
                              <div class="line">Second to none that lives here in the city:</div>
                              <div class="line">His word might bear my wealth at any time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak softly; yonder, as I think, he walks.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ANTIPHOLUS of Syracuse and DROMIO of Syracuse</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis so; and that self chain about his neck</div>
                              <div class="line">Which he forswore most monstrously to have.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good sir, draw near to me, I'll speak to him.</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Antipholus, I wonder much</div>
                              <div class="line">That you would put me to this shame and trouble;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, not without some scandal to yourself,</div>
                              <div class="line">With circumstance and oaths so to deny</div>
                              <div class="line">This chain which now you wear so openly:</div>
                              <div class="line">Beside the charge, the shame, imprisonment,</div>
                              <div class="line">You have done wrong to this my honest friend,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, but for staying on our controversy,</div>
                              <div class="line">Had hoisted sail and put to sea to-day:</div>
                              <div class="line">This chain you had of me; can you deny it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">I think I had; I never did deny it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, that you did, sir, and forswore it too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Who heard me to deny it or forswear it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">These ears of mine, thou know'st did hear thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie on thee, wretch! 'tis pity that thou livest</div>
                              <div class="line">To walk where any honest man resort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art a villain to impeach me thus:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll prove mine honour and mine honesty</div>
                              <div class="line">Against thee presently, if thou darest stand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">I dare, and do defy thee for a villain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They draw</p>
                        <p>Enter ADRIANA, LUCIANA, the Courtezan, and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold, hurt him not, for God's sake! he is mad.</div>
                              <div class="line">Some get within him, take his sword away:</div>
                              <div class="line">Bind Dromio too, and bear them to my house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DROMIO OF SYRACUSE</div>
                              <div class="line">Run, master, run; for God's sake, take a house!</div>
                              <div class="line">This is some priory. In, or we are spoil'd!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Antipholus of Syracuse and Dromio of Syracuse
to the Priory</p>
                        <p>Enter the Lady Abbess, AEMILIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Be quiet, people. Wherefore throng you hither?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">To fetch my poor distracted husband hence.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us come in, that we may bind him fast</div>
                              <div class="line">And bear him home for his recovery.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I knew he was not in his perfect wits.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sorry now that I did draw on him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">How long hath this possession held the man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">This week he hath been heavy, sour, sad,</div>
                              <div class="line">And much different from the man he was;</div>
                              <div class="line">But till this afternoon his passion</div>
                              <div class="line">Ne'er brake into extremity of rage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath he not lost much wealth by wreck of sea?</div>
                              <div class="line">Buried some dear friend? Hath not else his eye</div>
                              <div class="line">Stray'd his affection in unlawful love?</div>
                              <div class="line">A sin prevailing much in youthful men,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who give their eyes the liberty of gazing.</div>
                              <div class="line">Which of these sorrows is he subject to?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">To none of these, except it be the last;</div>
                              <div class="line">Namely, some love that drew him oft from home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">You should for that have reprehended him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, so I did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but not rough enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">As roughly as my modesty would let me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Haply, in private.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">And in assemblies too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but not enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">It was the copy of our conference:</div>
                              <div class="line">In bed he slept not for my urging it;</div>
                              <div class="line">At board he fed not for my urging it;</div>
                              <div class="line">Alone, it was the subject of my theme;</div>
                              <div class="line">In company I often glanced it;</div>
                              <div class="line">Still did I tell him it was vile and bad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">And thereof came it that the man was mad.</div>
                              <div class="line">The venom clamours of a jealous woman</div>
                              <div class="line">Poisons more deadly than a mad dog's tooth.</div>
                              <div class="line">It seems his sleeps were hinder'd by thy railing,</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore comes it that his head is light.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou say'st his meat was sauced with thy upbraidings:</div>
                              <div class="line">Unquiet meals make ill digestions;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thereof the raging fire of fever bred;</div>
                              <div class="line">And what's a fever but a fit of madness?</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou say'st his sports were hinderd by thy brawls:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet recreation barr'd, what doth ensue</div>
                              <div class="line">But moody and dull melancholy,</div>
                              <div class="line">Kinsman to grim and comfortless despair,</div>
                              <div class="line">And at her heels a huge infectious troop</div>
                              <div class="line">Of pale distemperatures and foes to life?</div>
                              <div class="line">In food, in sport and life-preserving rest</div>
                              <div class="line">To be disturb'd, would mad or man or beast:</div>
                              <div class="line">The consequence is then thy jealous fits</div>
                              <div class="line">Have scared thy husband from the use of wits.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">She never reprehended him but mildly,</div>
                              <div class="line">When he demean'd himself rough, rude and wildly.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why bear you these rebukes and answer not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">She did betray me to my own reproof.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good people enter and lay hold on him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, not a creature enters in my house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then let your servants bring my husband forth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither: he took this place for sanctuary,</div>
                              <div class="line">And it shall privilege him from your hands</div>
                              <div class="line">Till I have brought him to his wits again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or lose my labour in assaying it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will attend my husband, be his nurse,</div>
                              <div class="line">Diet his sickness, for it is my office,</div>
                              <div class="line">And will have no attorney but myself;</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore let me have him home with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEMELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Be patient; for I will not let him stir</div>
                              <div class="line">Till I have used the approved means I have,</div>
                              <div class="line">With wholesome syrups, drugs and holy prayers,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make of him a formal man again:</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a branch and parcel of mine oath,</div>
                              <div class="line">A charitable duty of my order.</div>
